```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
phone <- read_csv("data/20190928-items.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
head(phone)
```

```{r}
phone %>% 
  count(brand) %>%
  arrange(desc(n))
```

```{r}
phone %>% 
  filter(brand %in% "Samsung") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = rating)) +
  geom_histogram(col = "white", bins = 25)
```

```{r}
phone %>%
  filter(brand %in% "Samsung") %>%
  summarise(count = n(),
            mean = mean(rating),
            sd = sd(rating)
  )
```
